products.title: Football
products.description: The ball of America's favorite sport, great for pick up games or throwing around in the backyard.

products.title: Basketball
products.description: Bounce around this ball and take your shot at the hoop.

products.title: Baseball
products.description: The ball from America's favorite pastime, throw this ball with all your might and try strike out the batter.

products.title: Hockey Puck
products.description: Whack this thing with all your strength along the slippery ice, or a slick floor.

products.title: Soccer Ball
products.description: Kick this ball around, though due to store policy if you every touch it with your hands you will be forced to return it with no refund.

products.title: Playground Ball
products.description: A fun ball to bounce around or to play 4-square with, it will even last longer than a day before it deflates or gets warped.
